items.title: Automation and ETL Processes
items.description: Development of scraping and ETL processes for real-time data collection, transformation, and visualization.
items.longDescription: Project focused on automating repetitive tasks and data management. I implemented complete scraping processes using Selenium to extract data from external sources, and ETL pipelines developed in Python with Pandas to clean, transform, and adapt the data. Results were stored in databases and displayed in dynamic reports, optimizing access to key information. The entire workflow was versioned and controlled on GitHub, ensuring scalability and maintainability.
features: Data scraping from multiple external sources
ETL processes for cleaning, transforming, and loading data
Version control and collaboration with GitHub

items.title: Social Network - Twitter/X Simulation
items.description: Interactive web app recreating the experience of a modern social network, with posts, likes, retweets, and followers system.
items.longDescription: Project built with Next.js simulating a social network like Twitter/X. The platform provides a smooth and dynamic user experience, allowing registration or login, posting content, liking, retweeting, and following other users. Designed as a practical environment to showcase fullstack development skills, combining secure authentication with engaging social features.
features: Likes and retweets to encourage engagement

items.title: Weather App
items.description: Web application to check weather anywhere in the world, with responsive design and dark mode.
items.longDescription: Built with React, this app lets users check weekly weather conditions in any region available through the public API used. Information updates in real time, providing accurate data for multiple countries and cities. The design is modern, interactive, and fully responsive, including a dark mode to enhance user experience.
features: Weekly forecast anywhere in the world
Responsive design optimized for all devices

items.title: GitHub Jobs
items.description: Web portal to browse tech job offers with minimalist design and smooth navigation.
items.longDescription: This site simulates a job board where users can explore tech job opportunities. Job data (company, description, salary range, etc.) is dynamically fetched from third-party APIs. The interface is 100% responsive with a minimalist design for distraction-free browsing.
features: Dynamic data retrieval from external APIs

items.title: Python Game - Dragon Ball TCG (Trading Card Game)
items.description: Implementation of the classic Snake game developed in Python with a graphical interface.
items.longDescription: Full recreation of the Snake game using Python and Pygame. Includes scoring system, difficulty levels, sound effects, and personal record saving.

items.title: Quiz App
items.description: Interactive quiz game in two languages, with capitals and flags modes.
items.longDescription: A trivia-style app built with React, where the user can select language (Spanish or English) and game mode. In 'Capitals', the player must guess the country for a random capital. In 'Flags', dynamically fetched flags from a public API are shown, and the user must guess their country of origin. The game ends at the first wrong answer, encouraging challenge and replayability.
features: Two game modes: capitals and flags
Flags dynamically retrieved from an API

items.title: Netflix Clone
items.description: Simulation of the Netflix platform with dynamic catalog and trailers.
items.longDescription: Inspired by Netflix's interface, this project replicates a streaming platform where users can browse a catalog of movies and series updated in real time via the Netflix API. Includes trailer viewing directly in the app. Code is optimized for reusability and lightweight performance, ensuring a great user experience.
features: Dynamic catalog of movies and series
